name: Gyroscope at rest
description: Test that sensor reports ~0 rad/s total angular velocity when device is at rest.

name: Test +Z angular velocity
description: Test that sensor reports positive angular velocity around the Z axis when rotating device counter-clockwise around its Z axis.

name: Test -Z angular velocity
description: Test that sensor reports negative angular velocity around the Z axis when rotating device clockwise around its Z axis.

name: Test +X angular velocity
description: Test that sensor reports positive angular velocity around the X axis when rotating device counter-clockwise around its X axis.

name: Test -X angular velocity
description: Test that sensor reports negative angular velocity around the X axis when rotating device clockwise around its X axis.

name: Test +Y angular velocity
description: Test that sensor reports positive angular velocity around the Y axis when rotating device counter-clockwise around its Y axis.

name: Test -Y angular velocity
description: Test that sensor reports negative angular velocity around the Y axis when rotating device clockwise around its Y axis.
